ModMetaData.name: Initial Conditions #3: Homestead flavor
ModMetaData.author: Various
ModMetaData.description:
Combines my favorite homestead-y bits from various mods:
* [sd] round tables - just the small table * Fireplaces by BaconBits * Animal Trough by BaconBits, tweaked to hold corn, too * Barn Stall by BaconBits * Wall Torch by BaconBits, just the fueled one
By me: * Coffee table
